original_text: Her prophets are light and treacherous persons: her priests have polluted the sanctuary, they have done violence to the law.
korean_text: 그의 선지자들은 경솔하고 간사한 사람들이요 그의 제사장들은 성소를 더럽히고 율법을 범하였도다

sentences.original_text: Her prophets are light and treacherous persons
her priests have polluted the sanctuary
they have done violence to the law
